Wyatt Coleman, nke a makwaara dị ka Wyldfyer bụ onye America na-emepụta egwu nke a maara na mbụ màkà mmepụta ya màkà album promo ya (site na Jay-Z), The Black Album: Classik
Mgbè ọ natasịrị nyocha dị egwu na mkpọtụ okporo ámá site na Atlanta (ụlọ ya ugbu a) ruo Philadelphia (obodo ya), abọm Wyldfyer ghọrọ akụkọ ifo
N'ihi nke ahụ, Saint Nick bụbu nke So So Def chọpụtara ya ébé ọ rụrụ ọrụ na "Time and Time Again", abụ nke pụtara na Missy Elliott's The Cookbook
Site n'ebe ahụ ka a kọwaara Wyldfyer na L.E.S

Mgbè ha nwesịrị mmekọrịta, Wyldfayer ga-aga n'ihu na-emepụta egwu màkà Nas's "Hip Hop Is Dead", gụnyere "Money Over Bullshit", Ụdị mbụ nke "Olileanya" na mmekorita a tụrụ anya ya n'etiti Nas na Jay-Z, "Black Republican".

Mgbè o mepụtara ihe a na-ekwu okwu banyéré Nas "War is Necessary" nke pụtara na egwuregwu vidio kachasị ere, Grand Theft Auto IV, Wyldfyer mepụtara onwé ya ma soro Down South Legend, Ludacris rụkọọ ọrụ.  "Last of a Dying Breed" (Previewed during the 2008 BET Hip Hop Awards), nke gosipụtara Lil Wayne na "M na-eme ya màkà Hip Hop" nke gosipụtara duo a ma ama nke Nas na Jay-Z bụ nsonaazụ
Ụda abụọ dị iche iche nke otu ónyé na-emepụta, Wyldfyer mepụtara.
Tres Leches Radio- The Main Ingredient (With Music Producer Wyldfyer bit.ly/TLRWyld http://illroots.com/2007/04/09/featured-wyldfyre-2/ illRoots.com Interview with Wyldfayer]
